item.title: Kenworth W900 Highway Killer v7.6 ATS
item.description:
Kenworth W900 Highway Killer v7.6 ATS

Standalone truck

– High quality 3D model
– High quality detailed exterior and interior
– High quality rims & 3D tires
– High quality mirrors reflection
– Own wheels, sound, interior
– Choice of color body / metallic paint / skins
– Choice of wheels and rims
– Choice of transmission, gearbox
– Choice of cabins (3 types: AeroCab sleeper, Flattop sleeper, DayCab);
– Choice of chassis (10 types)
– Tuning and accesories present
– Cabin Accesories DLC support
– Cables trailer support
– Buy from Kenworth or Acces Mod dealer

Changes: adapted to the latest game patch 1.52 / 1.53



How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods

In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.




DOWNLOAD MOD

item.title: Peterbilt 389 Glider Truck v6.6.2 ATS
item.description:
Peterbilt 389 Glider Truck v6.6.2 ATS

– High quality 3D model
– High quality detailed exterior and interior
– High quality rims & 3D tires
– High quality mirrors reflection
– Own wheels, sound, interior
– Choice of chassis (12 types)
– Choice of cabins (5 types)
– Lots of accessories: bumpers, visors, fenders, lights, lamps, headlights, rear bumpers, tanks, stairs, visors, exhausts and other accessories
– Full animated interior including pedals, ignition key
– Tuning and accesories present
– Interior accesories support
– Cables Trailer support
– Cabin Accesories DLC support
– Supports all major functions of the game
– Buy from Peterbilt or Acces Mod dealer

Changes: adapted to the latest game patch 1.52 / 1.53



How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods

In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.




DOWNLOAD MOD

item.title: Scania SpectransGroup 8X2/8X4 v5.5.1 ETS2
item.description:
Scania SpectransGroup 8X2/8X4 v5.5.1 ETS2

– High-quality model of the exterior and interior;
– 3 chassis (8×2 BDF/8×4 BDF/8×4 Tractor);
– 2 types of platforms (container/tanker and multi-lift);
– Many container skins;
– Many tanker skins;
– Engines with their own sounds;
– Garbage container for the Multilift platform;
– Various accessories;
– Skinpack and template for your personal skins;
– Interior with full animation (including animated pedals, ignition key);
– Owner’s trailer;
– Various accessories for trailers.

– Adapted to the latest game patch 1.52 / 1.53



How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods

In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.




DOWNLOAD MOD

item.title: Scania R520 Adwin Stam Combo v6.5 ETS2
item.description:
Scania R520 Adwin Stam Combo v6.5 ETS2

– High-quality exterior and interior models with detailed animations
– Accurate tuning based on real-life prototypes
– Includes three types of trailers with original skins
– Original interior with fully animated pedals, ignition key, and more
– Compatible with DLC Cabin Accessories and SISL’s Mega Pack
– Choose between assembling the truck in its original or new configuration
– Authentic truck and trailer wheels
– Immersive sounds by Kapitan Kriechbaum
– Full standalone mod with liftable axles and steerable axles
– Animated brackets and various cargo options, including an empty variant

– Adapted to the latest game patch 1.52 / 1.53



How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods

In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.




DOWNLOAD MOD

item.title: VOLVO FM & FMX v2.2 1.52-1.53.x ETS2
item.description:
VOLVO FM & FMX v2.2 1.52-1.53.x ETS2

FULL version includes: Daycab & LXL cabins. Chassis 6x (some variants). 17 front grill models. Metallic paints collection. Painted fenders & fenders caps. Trucks in quick jobs (4×2 & 6×2). Trucks in truck browser.

VOLVO FM & FMX v2.2 LITE. v2.2

Changes:
Adaptation to ETS2 1.53.x.
Added interior shadows feature.
Added missing black color icon.
Added metallic paint collection.

Just enjoy it!

You need SiS’L megapack to have all the cabin accessories available. Clean gamelog!



How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods

In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
